title: wd1
author: wd1
created_time: June 16, 2022, 05:57:59 AMLast edit: August 25, 2022, 11:00:37 AM by wd1
content: Hello,I am a web developer and designer with over 5 years of experience. I can create a modern and mobile-friendly WordPress website, e-commerce store or blog for you,  starting from just $95. Everything in the website from the color to the fonts will be tailored according to your requirements.Here are some wordpress sites I have made:https://hekrenovations.comhttps://www.weburnshop.com/https://sharpened-edge.com/https://nmre.infohttps://geoperspective.orghttps://www.pinayschengenvisa.comhttps://bdcoatings.ca/I strive to make the website as fast as possible and don't use anything unnecessary. The delivery time will be pretty fast too and I will give you my opinion as well on different aspects of the site.I am proficient in React.js development too and can build most types of app. Here are some apps I have made (second is a dummy portfolio ecom store):http://farmbitcoin.xyz/https://reactecomsite.netlify.app/I have also made web scrapers, small python scripts for different clients in the pasts. Feel free to send me a message and we can talk further. Thanks for your time!!

comments.author: 00status
comments.body: I'm interested in discussing a project with you. Unable to DM based on your settings

comments.body: I am very sorry! I thought I would get email notifications but I didn't. I am available now if you are still interested. I will check and post regularly here too from now on.
